subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Several hundred Mets fans gathered down the left-field line at Coors Field on Saturday night, chanting “Let’s go, Mets!” whenever the team scored, which was so often it became a chorus of the night.
snippet: Several hundred Mets fans gathered down the left-field line at Coors Field on Saturday night, chanting “Let’s go, Mets!” whenever the team scored, which was so often it became a chorus of the night.
